name: Iridescent Hair - LORA - WIP
description:
I would like to offer a wide variety of options when it comes to creating characters (more customization), from clothes, to hair, to irises and even hairstyles.

In this Lora training I focused on creating iridescent hair, although due to my lack of knowledge (I only trained once) the character's eyes, clothes and even the face are affected by this effect, not just the hair.

If you can help me I would appreciate it, here I leave the info of what I used:

<lora:iridescent_hair:1> works quite well between 0.4 and 0.8

It is trained with 35 images (Train Batch Size: 2 and Epoch: 1 = 1700 steps) birming clipped and clipped using the Kohya_SS utilities. LORA configuration:

1- https://prnt.sc/qObBnzLo0by5

2- https://prnt.sc/5IL9Fd_i1QJm

This post is to reveal the first of many models that I want to share with the community. In fact, I feel that I can get better potential from my 3060 and that is why I would like you to send me a better configuration for Kohya_SS. If someone can also advise me on how to improve my training using Kohya in the comments, I would appreciate it.

meta.prompt: A breathtaking scene of a mermaid with iridescent hair, holding a trident in one hand and a pearl in the other, swimming with a school of colorful fish in a vibrant coral reef <lora:iridescent_hair:0.7>

Masterpiece, 1girl, iridescent hair with a color gradient of pink, purple and blue, wearing a white flowing dress, standing on a grassy meadow with a butterfly perched on her hand. Best quality. <lora:iridescent_hair:0.7>

Masterpiece, best quality, 1girl, with iridescent silver hair styled in twin braids, beautiful purple eyes, wearing a flowing white dress with gold accents and holding a bouquet of lilacs, standing in a lush garden with a stone archway in the background. <lora:iridescent_hair:0.7> glow hair, multicolor hair
